body:
## Release Notes

- Add release-drafter github action. @iphydf (#126)
- Run newer ktlint from rules_kotlin v1.9.6. @iphydf (#125)
- Use Bazel's built-in constraint values @robinlinden (#123)
- Drop compat bits for not-quite-C++14 compilers @robinlinden (#122)
- Add ktlint test to bazel build. @iphydf (#118)
- Give libtox4j-c.so and jvm-toxcore-c public visibility @robinlinden (#121)
- More cleanup of unused debug logging code. @iphydf (#116)
- Make sure JNI can call the Code-only ctor in exceptions. @iphydf (#120)
- Add preliminary support for multiplatform. @iphydf (#117)
- Fix build scripts breaking if parens exist in $PATH @robinlinden (#106)
- Apply and enforce ktlint @robinlinden (#115)
- Delete JNI protolog. @iphydf (#114)
- Remove all star imports. @iphydf (#113)
- Remove the `invoke*` calls. @iphydf (#112)
- Move to protobuf-lite. @iphydf (#111)
- Add preliminary gradle build. @iphydf (#110)
- Start rewriting to Kotlin. @iphydf (#108)
- Fix build w/ libstdc++13 @robinlinden (#107)
- Add missing dependency on annotations. @iphydf (#91)
- Video packet ids are now valid; adjust test. @iphydf (#88)
- Reduce code size of AudioPlaybackShow_deploy. @iphydf (#85)
- Fix BUILD file format with buildifier. @iphydf (#86)
- Add support for Windows builds. @iphydf (#83)
- Migrate java dependencies to rules_jvm_external. @iphydf (#84)
- Make audio playback tests available to bazel build. @iphydf (#82)
- Release tox4j 0.2.3. @iphydf (#81)
- Use org.jetbrains:annotations instead of com.intellij. @iphydf (#80)
- Update protobuf to 3.11.1. @iphydf (#79)
- Fix JNI library loading for new JRE versions. @iphydf (#78)
- Use rules_cc instead of native cc_library rules. @iphydf (#77)
- Use `ByteSizeLong`, replacing the deprecated `ByteSize` call. @iphydf (#76)
- Update SBT version in the c++ project to 0.13.18. @iphydf (#75)
- Use rules_proto instead of built-in proto_library rule. @iphydf (#74)
- Update libsodium to 1.0.18 @robinlinden (#72)
- Fixes for bazel 2.1.1; remove most bootstrap nodes. @iphydf (#73)
- Fix build @robinlinden (#71)
- Make JVM shared library locations more portable. @iphydf (#67)
- Avoid some clang warnings in C++ code. @iphydf (#66)
- Use a working DHT node for bootstrap tests. @iphydf (#65)
- Remove extra semicolon. @iphydf (#64)
- Enable .travis.yml check and use non-markdown license. @iphydf (#63)
- Stop building for i686. @iphydf (#62)
- Fix Makefile to use correct script path. @iphydf (#61)
- Use `scala_import`s instead of `:file` for jar dependencies. @iphydf (#60)
- Fix Travis and Coveralls badges. @iphydf (#59)
- Remove `--enable-minimal` from libsodium build. @iphydf (#58)
- Downgrade libsodium version. @iphydf (#57)
- Remove `TOX_MAX_HOSTNAME_LENGTH` constant definition. @iphydf (#56)
- Upgrade dependencies in build script. @iphydf (#55)
- Use @scalatest instead of our own @org_scalatest. @iphydf (#53)
- Prepare for tox4j-c release 0.2.0. @iphydf (#51)
- Remove TOXAV from the linker flags. @iphydf (#50)
- Add a bazel test that ensures all our projects are GPL-3.0. @iphydf (#49)
- Add OSX support for bazel build. @iphydf (#48)
- Add preliminary support for freebsd. @iphydf (#46)
- Revert "Add support for the new CORRECTION message type." @iphydf (#45)
- Relicense under GPLv3. @iphydf (#44)
- Avoid clashes with "build" directories on case-insensitive file systems. @iphydf (#43)
- Update to split audio/video bit rate setter functions. @iphydf (#42)
- Make sure the Test stage comes before the Release stage. @iphydf (#41)
- Pretend we don't have make_unique in bazel. @iphydf (#40)
- Use the //c-toxcore public BUILD target. @iphydf (#39)
- Add support for the new CORRECTION message type. @iphydf (#37)
- Ensure that all test files have unique names. @iphydf (#38)
- Move some used-once sbt plugins into the jvm-toxcore-c repo. @iphydf (#36)
- Don't dereference Tox_Options, use getters instead. @iphydf (#35)
- Our own \/ type won't support .get, but it does .toOption. @iphydf (#34)
- Remove unused JNI export of libsodium functions. @iphydf (#33)
- Remove encoding/decoding tests. @iphydf (#32)
- Add support for loading the native library from jar. @iphydf (#31)
- Remove the gui client from tox4j-c. @iphydf (#29)
- Split C++ and Scala files and build systems. @iphydf (#28)
- Use official markdown license for AGPLv3. @iphydf (#25)
- Don't use `git.depth=1` anymore. @iphydf (#24)
- Add OSX (x86_64-darwin) build. @iphydf (#22)
- Add `localDiscoveryEnabled` to tox options. @iphydf (#21)
- Only fetch 1 revision from git during Travis builds. @iphydf (#20)
- Update versions and add dependencies list in README.md. @iphydf (#12)
- Fall back to arm android in ToxLoadJniLibrary if platform detection fails @iphydf (#19)
- Avoid partial functions (head/last) and auto-toString. @iphydf (#18)
- Update versions of dependencies and pin native dependency versions. @iphydf (#15)
- Updates for new toxencryptsave API in 0.1.0. @iphydf (#8)
- Update to android NDK r13b. @iphydf (#5)
- Fix Android build and update to NDK r12b. @iphydf (#4)
- Support both irungentoo/toxcore and toktok/c-toxcore. @iphydf (#3)
- Split tox4j into separate repos. @iphydf (#2)
- Re-enable native dependency build @iphydf (#1)

## Features

- Add conferences and groups to native java bindings. @iphydf (#124)

## Maintenance (Grunt tasks)

- Support publishing the kmp jvm artifacts to maven repos @robinlinden (#130)
- Switch from kmp to a normal jvm library @robinlinden (#131)
- Use built-in cc_proto_library. @iphydf (#128)
- Use latest instead of versioned toktok-stack image. @iphydf (#99)
- Don't try to resolve now-sunset bintray repositories @robinlinden (#97)
- Fix missing include path to jni_md.h on some systems @robinlinden (#98)
- Only require jni.h to be found when searching for the JNI @robinlinden (#96)
- Use toktok-stack 0.0.23 for cirrus builds. @iphydf (#95)
- Update ndk to r21 @robinlinden (#87)
- Remove travis; add cirrus ci. @iphydf (#93)

## Maintenance (Code cleanup)

- Remove deprecated group APIs. @iphydf (#129)
- Change constants to the new value in toxcore. @iphydf (#127)

## Maintenance (Tests)

- Add a live node bootstrap test. @iphydf (#132)
- Remove tests that no longer work with better error reporting. @iphydf (#105)
name: v0.1.0
